action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Zhentilar makes two attacks, using Shortsword or Pistol in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Knock Down.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Poison damage.

action.name: Knock Down
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 12}, one creature within 5 feet that the Zhentilar can see. {@actSaveFail} 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.
